package taskL3T08
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DatabaseConnection
    The DatabaseConnection class handles the connection to the database.
    DatabaseManager
    The DatabaseManager class handles database operations such as displaying, adding, updating, and deleting records.
    InputHandler
    The InputHandler class handles user input from the console.
    MenuManager
    The MenuManager class handles the display and navigation of menus in the application.
    PoisePMSManager
    The PoisePMSManager class is the entry point of the application.
    ProjectManager
    The ProjectManager class handles all operations related to projects in the database.
